comment.text: The "LimitByTime" translation key is used to display the label for a time period limit setting, guiding users to adjust their expiration date in a settings interface. It appears as part of a category in developer tools and is used within a link hint component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'الحد حسب الفترة الزمنية' while conveying a general sense, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Limit by time period'. It literally translates to 'The limit according to the time period'. A more idiomatic and accurate translation would convey the meaning of restricting or constraining based on time.

The translation 'Vaxt dövrü ilə məhdudlaşdırın' is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Limit by time period'. It sounds awkward in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'Müddət ilə məhdudlaşdırın' or 'Zamanla məhdudlaşdırın'.
While technically correct, "Սահմանափակում ըստ ժամանակաշրջանի" is a bit literal and formal. A more natural and idiomatic translation might be "Ժամանակային սահմանափակում" or "Սահմանափակել ժամանակով".

The translation 'Limite per periodo di tempo' is a literal translation but may not be the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Limit by time period' in Italian. A more natural phrasing might emphasize the restriction imposed by a timeframe.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Limitazione temporale' or 'Vincolo temporale'. The best choice depends on the precise context of JavascriptSdk:LimitByTime.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Setare limită de timp" is understandable, it's not the most natural or accurate translation of "Limit by time period." "Limit by time period" implies a constraint or restriction based on time, whereas "Setare limită de timp" reads more like a setting of a time limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Limitare temporală" or "Restricție temporală" which better convey the concept of a time-based limit or restriction.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "කාල පරාසය අනුව සීමා කරන්න" (Kala parasa yanu sima kanna) while technically understandable, doesn't capture the nuance of 'Limit by time period' as directly as possible. A more accurate translation would focus on the 'limiting' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "නිශ්චිත කාලයට සීමා කරන්න" (Nischita kalaya sima kanna) or "සීමාවල කාලසීමාවකට" (Simawal kalasima vake)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Zaman dilimine göre sınırlama" is understandable, a more natural and precise translation of "Limit by time period" would be "Zaman aralığına göre sınırlama" or "Belirli bir zaman aralığına göre sınırlama". "Zaman dilimine" can sometimes imply a specific historical period.
